articles.author: Muireann Duffy
articles.title: European court to rule on law relating to Graham Dwyer phone data challenge - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Dwyer received a life sentence for the murder of Elaine O'Hara in 2015
articles.content:
Updated: 8.30am
The European Court of Justice has ruled in favour of Graham Dwyers challenge against the legality of a law governing the retention of mobile phone data.
In 2015, Dwyer received a li… [+1097 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Oil climbs on prospect of fresh Russia sanctions - CNBC
articles.description: Oil futures extended gains on Tuesday as the U.S. and Europe planned new sanctions to punish Moscow over alleged war crimes by Russian troops in Ukraine.
articles.content: Oil futures extended gains on Tuesday as the United States and Europe planned new sanctions to punish Moscow over alleged war crimes by Russian troops in Ukraine, adding to concerns about supply disr… [+1989 chars]
